titleStmt.title: John Fox Gent. plaintiff; and Simon Harcourt Esq; defendant. In a writ of error brought by the plaintiff upon a judgment given against him in the Court of King's Bench, in an action of indebitatus assumpsit, there brought by Mr. Harcourt against Mr. Fox, for trying the right of the place of clerkship of the peace for the county of Middlesex.
titleStmt.author: Fox, John, fl. 1704-1735.
Harcourt, Simon Harcourt, Viscount, 1661?-1727.
